root.para:
These alternative investments include investments that are not listed on national exchanges or OTC markets or for which quoted market prices are not available from sources such as financial publications, the exchanges, or NASDAQ. These investments, as discussed in , “Applicability of Practical Expedient,” include hedge funds, private equity funds, real estate funds, venture capital funds, commodity funds, offshore fund vehicles, and funds of funds. Alternative investments may be structured as limited partnerships, limited liability corporations, trusts, or corporations. Technical Questions and Answers section 2220.18
All Q&A sections can be found in .
Technical Questions and Answers
